subject: As you know I'm Aisha Gaddafi
body:
As you know I'm Aisha Gaddafi the daughter of the former president of Libya late president Muammar Gaddafi who was killed in the civil war which took place in the year 2011 which ended up his life on the 20th October 2011.Before the death of my father the Late President of Libya he made a deposit of 10 million US dollars with a security company there in Ghana . That no one knows about except we the children and now my brother is in prison for trial for war crime so i am the only one left out and i got an mail from the security company , that i have to come for the funds but now i can't because After the death of my father the UN and Libya Government has been tracking all my father's wealth and money everywhere around the globe my dear but, this was the last deposit my father made before he died,so i am looking for a trust worthy person to stand as my foreign beneficiary to help me claim the funds and i am ready to reward  whoever he or she may be and i will also let the security company  know that i am appointing the person as my beneficiary, and help me receive my funds from the security company  so i can come out of my present ordeal and to go somewhere to start a new good life somewhere my friend....Please i will love to read from you and let me know if you will be able to help me with this and i promise that this transaction will be smooth and free there is no need to be afraid and please this must be a secret between  both of us hope to hear from you soonest.Best Regards.Dr Aisha Muammar Gaddafi. 
Best Regards.
Dr Aisha Muammar Gaddafi

subject: Re:  As you know I'm Aisha Gaddafi
body:
Hello Dr. Aisha Muammar Gaddafi,

Wow, your story is quite intriguing! I can't imagine what it must be like to be in your shoes. It's fascinating that you're reaching out for help in such a unique situation.

I'm curious about the process of claiming these funds. How does one go about becoming a foreign trustee? Also, how would the security company verify my identity as your appointed representative?

And don't worry, I understand the need for secrecy in this matter. Your secret is safe with me.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Dr Aisha Muammar Gaddafi? I WANT YOU TO HELP ME TO CONTACT THE BARRISTER BROWN JOHNSON
body:
I have already informed the security company to make a transfer of one box
to you in your country. I have  already explained the whole situation  to
the Barrister Brown Johnson and he understood everything so he will make a
change of ownership to your name  successfully because he is a very
reliable man. Please, you must cooperate with him and do what he asks you
to do so that the transfer of the money will be successful without any
security interference.

Barrister, Brown Johnson
Royal House Chambers
Solicitors & Advocates
Block 2, Flat 5, kojo Rd,
Tell;00 or Tell +233550123751
Mailing address:(barristerbrownjohnson.royal@gmail.com)
P. O. Box M.463 Accra Ghana,
West -Africa.
Accra Ghana
Tell +233550123751

You must contact him with  the below message.

Dear Barrister Brown Johnson

Sir, my name is  ............. . I live  at ............., I came in
contact with Aisha Gaddafi who deposited the sum of $10,000,000.00 United
state Dollars in  a security company there in Ghana . I am in contact with
you because my Friend Aisha has requested the fund to be transferred to me
in my country  as I will need it to invest in some profitable business here
in my Country. I would have loved to come to Ghana myself for the claim of
my fund with the security company  but I could not travel to your country,
due to personal/private reasons. Please kindly tell me how best and what is
needed from my side for my fund to be transferred to me here in my country
so that I will get you all your necessary requirements and also inform the
security  here on how  the funds can be transferred to me. i wait to hear
from you

Please respond upon receipt of this mail.

Cordially,yours

subject: Re: Dr Aisha Muammar Gaddafi? I WANT YOU TO HELP ME TO CONTACT THE BARRISTER BROWN JOHNSON
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. It sounds like a significant undertaking, and I'm intrigued to learn more about it.

I must say, Barrister Brown Johnson seems like a very reliable person based on your description. However, I'm curious to know how you came to know him? Also, could you please tell me more about the security company that is involved in this transfer?

Regarding the message to Barrister Brown Johnson, I understand that Aisha Gaddafi has deposited a sum of money in a security company in Ghana. Could you please provide more details about Aisha Gaddafi and her connection with this transaction?

Lastly, I would love to hear more about the profitable business opportunities that are available in my country through this fund.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Dr Aisha Muammar Gaddafi? I WANT YOU TO HELP ME TO CONTACT THE BARRISTER BROWN JOHNSON

company of Ghana so that you can be able to help me to invest the funds
wisely in your country, all I have to tell you as soon as you get my
message and I want you to help me to contact the barrister immediately, and
I also want you to send me your full house address details.

subject: Re: Dr Aisha Muammar Gaddafi? I WANT YOU TO HELP ME TO CONTACT THE BARRISTER BROWN JOHNSON
body:
Hello there,

I hope this message finds you well. I must say, your story is quite intriguing and it's not every day that one gets to hear about such a unique situation. 

I'm curious to know more about the security company in Ghana. Could you tell me more about how they operate? And what kind of gold business was your late father involved in? It sounds fascinating.

As for Barrister Brown Johnson, he seems like a very reliable person indeed. However, I would like to know more about him before proceeding with any further steps. Could you share some more details about his background and his relationship with your family?

Regarding the funds, I appreciate your trust in me but I think it's important for us to understand each other better before we proceed with such a significant transaction. Could you tell me more about why you chose me for this task?

Lastly, while I am interested in helping out, I must inform you that sharing my full house address details is something that I am not comfortable with at this stage. I hope you understand my concerns.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: Dr Aisha Muammar Gaddafi? I WANT YOU TO HELP ME TO CONTACT THE BARRISTER BROWN JOHNSON
body:
Hello there,

I hope this message finds you well. It's quite interesting to hear about your situation and the role of Barrister Brown Johnson in it. I must say, it sounds like a complex matter.

You mentioned that your late father was involved in some gold business in Ghana and that Barrister Brown Johnson knows everything about the security company there. Could you please elaborate more on this? What kind of business was your father involved in?

Also, you mentioned that you want me to stand as the Next of Kin to help receive funds from the security company. I'm curious, why did you choose me for this task? 

Regarding contacting Barrister Brown Johnson, I would be happy to do so but I need more information before proceeding. Can you tell me more about him? How long has he been practicing law? And what is his relationship with the security company?

Lastly, I noticed that you asked for my full house address details. For privacy reasons, I am unable to provide such personal information at this time.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: Dr Aisha Muammar Gaddafi? I WANT YOU TO HELP ME TO CONTACT THE BARRISTER BROWN JOHNSON
body:
Hello there,

I hope this message finds you well. I must say, your story is quite intriguing and it's not every day that one gets contacted about such matters.

Thank you for your detailed message. I must admit, it's a lot to take in and I'm trying my best to understand everything. You mentioned Barrister Brown Johnson, who seems to be a key person in this matter. Could you tell me more about him? How long have you known him and what is his role exactly?
